name: MIS Monthly Serious or Sexual Assault Incident Summary
description: INC0012 - v1.6 Last Modified 22/05/2017 This report returns the serious and/or sexual assaults for establishments for a date range selected by the user at run-time

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Incidents Assault On (4)
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT TO_DATE('01/' || TO_CHAR(AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, 'MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS 1ST_OF_THE_MONTH, AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.QUESTIONNAIRE_ANS_ID, AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_ANSWER AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK = AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (((AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE) BETWEEN (SELECT EARLIEST_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Earliest Incident Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:270) */) AND (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Latest Incident Date','D',,mono,free,Not_Persistent,User:271) */)) AND AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID IN (SELECT AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_TYPE AT_INCIDENT_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_QUESTION AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_ANSWER AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK = AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK = AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTIONNAIRE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.QUESTIONNAIRE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND ((AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_CODE_NK IN ('ASSAULTS3') AND ((AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION IN ('WAS A SERIOUS INJURY SUSTAINED', 'WAS THIS A SEXUAL ASSAULT', 'WAS MEDICAL TREATMENT FOR CONCUSSION OR INTERNAL INJURIES REQUIRED') AND AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION IN ('YES')) OR ((AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION IN ('IS THE ASSAILANT KNOWN TO HAVE AN INFECTIOUS DISEASE THAT CAN BE TRANSMITTED IN SALIVA') AND AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION IN ('YES')) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION IN ('DID THE SALIVA HIT THE BODY OR CLOTHING OF THE VICTIM(S)') AND AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION IN ('YES'))) OR (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION IN ('TYPE OF HOSPITAL ADMISSION') AND AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION IN ('INPATIENT (OVERNIGHT ONLY)', 'INPATIENT (OVER 24HR)', 'LIFE SUPPORT')) OR (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION IN ('WHERE DID IT HIT') AND AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION IN ('NECK OR ABOVE')) OR (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION IN ('DESCRIBE THE WEAPONS USED') AND AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION IN ('EXCRETA/URINE')))) OR (AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_CODE_NK IN ('ASSAULT') AND ((AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION IN ('WAS A SERIOUS INJURY SUSTAINED', 'WAS THIS A SEXUAL ASSAULT', 'DID INJURIES RESULT IN DETENTION IN OUTSIDE HOSPITAL AS AN IN-PATIENT', 'WAS MEDICAL TREATMENT FOR CONCUSSION OR INTERNAL INJURIES REQUIRED') AND AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION IN ('YES')) OR (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION IN ('WHICH SERIOUS INJURIES WERE SUSTAINED') AND AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION IN ('BITES', 'BLACK EYE', 'BROKEN NOSE', 'BROKEN TEETH', 'CRUSHING', 'EXTENSIVE/MULTIPLE BRUISING', 'EXTENSIVE OR MULTIPLE BRUISING', 'FRACTURE', 'SCALD OR BURN', 'STABBING', 'TEMPORARY/PERMANENT BLINDNESS')))))) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)

report.name: Monthly Serious or Sexual Assault Incident Summary

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_PRISONER_ON_STAFF_IN37
field.legacySql: =Count([Incident Case Id]) Where ([Incident Response Description] InList ("PRISONER ON OFFICER";"PRISONER ON STAFF"))

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_PRISONER_ON_PRISONER
field.legacySql: =Count([Incident Case Id]) Where ([Incident Response Description] = "PRISONER ON PRISONER")

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_PRISONER_ON_OTHER
field.legacySql: =Count([Incident Case Id]) Where ([Incident Response Description] ="PRISONER ON OTHER")

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_OTHER
field.legacySql: =Count([Incident Case Id]) Where ([Incident Questionnaire Ans Id] InList (213118;179731))
